description: Try our easy to follow Ham & Pickle Sandwiches recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Ham sandwich,Ham,High fibre,High protein,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Sandwich press,Quick & easy lunch,Low sugar,Peanut free
name: Ham & Pickle Sandwiches Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat sandwich press. Cut Turkish loaf into 4 even pieces and split each through the centre to make 8 slices in total.
Spread bases with pickles. Top ham with cheese. Finish with remaining bread. Spray both sides of each sandwich with olive oil.
Transfer to sandwich press and cook for about 8-10 minutes or until golden and crisp. Halve each and serve.
